titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1268) making Emergency Supplemental Appropriations for Defense, the Global War on Terror, and Tsunami Relief, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-73, by Mr. Cole (OK).
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 1268 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 35.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 258.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 196 (Roll no. 159).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/5/2005--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1268 (making emergency supplemental appropriations for FY 2005). Authorizes the Chairman of the Committee on the Judiciary, on behalf of the Committee, to file a supplemental report to accompany H.R. 748 (Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act).
